title: How very odd
author: VD
content_html: It’s an interesting thing to learn third-hand that you are now officially a child of divorce. I do hope I’ll hold up under this devastating emotional blow. I’m at a very impressionable age, you know.
content_text: It’s an interesting thing to learn third-hand that you are now officially a child of divorce.  I do hope I’ll hold up under this devastating emotional blow.  I’m at a very impressionable age, you know.
